markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The command center of Fort Deadlight and by extension, the entire faction of Captain Aeldys.

## Points of interest

* Straightforward: The main room contains the map and other war materials, with the private quarters off to the side. A single corridor runs around the donjon's north, connecting the stairwells together.

## Characters

* [Benweth](/benweth/)
* [Captain Aeldys](/captainAeldys/)

'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
The command center of Fort Deadlight and by extension, the entire faction of Captain Aeldys.

==Points of interest==
* Straightforward: The main room contains the map and other war materials, with the private quarters off to the side. A single corridor runs around the donjon's north, connecting the stairwells together.

==Characters==

* [[Captain Aeldys]]
